pullrequest.title: Adjusted vision perception to match SimSpark convention.

content.raw:
Yes, it seems like this axis got a flipped sign. It also looks more reasonable to have a positive one here instead of an negative one. I can confirm that your suggestion fixes this issue and have a screenshot of it if you like (but I already posted three...).
If you like, I'll add it to my pull request. However, I first need to check out how to do this ;)
